DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To determine influence counsel physical activity ( PA ) versus usual care ( UC ) magnitude chronic pain ( CP ) patient diagnose chronic low back pain ( CLBP ) . Methods : A total 64 subject ( CLBP ) old randomly divide two group : experimental group ( UC ) + counsel ( AF ) control group ( UC ) . Each group consist 32 participant evaluate twice ( pre post-intervention ) , space one month , group receive telephone follow-up participation . The primary endpoint magnitude ( CP ) measure tool grade scale chronic pain ( EGDC ) , secondary consider cardiovascular risk factor , catastrophism , kinesiofobia , disable back pain , quality life , anxiety depression ( FA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Physical Activity Counselling Severity Chronic Low Back Pain Patients With Cardiovascular Risk
